name: GitHub (Remote)
description: Interact with GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, actions, and code security through GitHub's hosted remote MCP server. No local setup required.

inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
inputs.description: Optional PAT for authentication instead of OAuth. If provided, sent as Bearer token. Leave empty to use OAuth flow.

obtain.instructions:
1. Click 'Generate new token (classic)'
2. Give it a name like 'McpMux'
3. Select scopes: repo, read:org
4. Click 'Generate token'
5. Copy the token (starts with ghp_)

auth.instructions: Uses OAuth by default. Optionally provide a Personal Access Token (PAT) with repo and read:org scopes for token-based auth.
